name: IMMZ.DT.17.HepatitisA
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hepatitis A vaccine at 1 year of age

action.title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis A - No Doses at 1 year old
action.description: Provide Hepatitis A immunization – using the "Hepatitis A vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Hepatitis A vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "1 year" and "Country is not highly endemic"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis A because no doses at 1 year old
